name: Simple Slow Cooker Jambalaya
author: Campbell's Kitchen
summary: Chicken, sausage and shrimp simmered with rice & veggies for a one-pot meal that's perfect for family gatherings.
ingredients: 2 pounds chicken thighs, cut into bite-size pieces
1 (12 ounce) package mirepoix (diced celery, carrots and onions)
½ cup chopped green bell pepper
1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Combine chicken, sausage, mirepoix mix, diced tomatoes, bell pepper, garlic, Swanson® Chicken Broth, Cajun seasoning, thyme, and oregano in a slow cooker
Cook on High until chicken is tender, 4 to 5 hours
During the last 30 minutes, add rice and shrimp; stir to combine
Let stand, covered, for at least 15 minutes to allow rice to absorb most of the remaining liquid
Garnish with fresh parsley, if desired
